predicate.note: Frames file for 'disburse' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 13.2.

example.name: with recipient
example.text: Friday's auction will be limited to $150 million disbursed *trace* by the Central Bank to potential investors.

example.name: with source
example.text: And though federal law dictates that only $100 million can be disbursed *trace* from that fund in any one state per disaster, administration officials expect Congress to move in to authorize spending more now in California.
